oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: John T. Wilder corresondence with Martha Wilder, 1863 April 16
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Wilder, John Thomas, 1830-1917
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter from J. T. Wilder to his wife Martha lamenting the fire damage to the top of their home in Greensburg, Indiana as well as General Rosecrans refusal to permit Col. Wilder to visit Indiana and help Martha repair their home.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: United States -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1865; United States -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1865 -- Health aspects
Rosecrans, William S. (William Starke), 1819-1898; Stewart, John
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: John T. Wilder correspondence with Martha Wilder, 1861-1865
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: John T. Wilder Civil War correspondence and papers
